mapper.sql: code_=values(code_), name_=values(name_), app_user_=values(app_user_), app_date_=values(app_date_), update_user_=values(update_user_), update_date_=values(update_date_)
mapper.insert:
insert into gcm_industry (code_, name_, app_user_, app_date_, update_user_, update_date_ ) values
(#{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.appUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.appDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
on duplicate key update
